statements: SELECT * FROM impact_of_industrial_activities;
SELECT location, impact_description FROM impact_of_industrial_activities;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_industrial_activities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT activity_type, location FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, location, impact_description FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Pollution';
SELECT * FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE location = 'New York' AND activity_type = 'Manufacturing'
SELECT id, location, impact_description FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Pollution' ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE impact_description LIKE '%negative%'
SELECT id, location, activity_type FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('Mining', 'Fishing')
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM impact_of_industrial_activities
SELECT * FROM ecosystems_impact;
SELECT ecosystem_name, impact_description FROM ecosystems_impact WHERE industrial_activity = 'Deforestation';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_info WHERE threat_level = 'Critical' ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, species_name, population_size FROM biodiversity_info WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem_name FROM biodiversity_info;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems_impact WHERE industrial_activity = 'Deforestation';
SELECT id, impact_description, ecosystem_name FROM ecosystems_impact WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT ecosystem_name FROM biodiversity_info WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT impact_description, ecosystem_name FROM ecosystems_impact WHERE industrial_activity = 'Pollution' AND ecosystem_name = 'Forest';
SELECT id, species_name, threat_level FROM biodiversity_info WHERE population_size > 5000 ORDER BY threat_level ASC, species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_activities;
SELECT id, activity_name, impact_type FROM impact_activities WHERE impact_type = 'Environmental';
SELECT activity_name, impact_description FROM impact_activities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_information WHERE region = 'Asia' ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, habitat_type FROM ecosystem_information WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM impact_activities;
SELECT activity_name, impact_type FROM impact_activities WHERE location='Forest';
SELECT * FROM ecosystem_information WHERE region='North America' ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT activity_name, impact_description FROM impact_activities WHERE id=1;

SELECT a.activity_name, e.ecosystem_name, ai.impact_level FROM impact_activities a JOIN activity_impact_mapping ai ON a.id = ai.activity_id JOIN ecosystem_information e ON e.id = ai.ecosystem_id WHERE e.habitat_type='Forest';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT activity_name, impact_description FROM impact_assessment WHERE ecosystem_type = 'forest' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM industrial_activities ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_count FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT change_type, affected_area FROM environmental_changes ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT activity_name, ecosystem_type FROM impact_assessment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM industrial_activities;
SELECT company_name, location FROM industrial_activities ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_count > 1000 AND habitat_type = 'forest';
SELECT * FROM impact_on_ecosystems;
SELECT activity_name, impact_description FROM impact_on_ecosystems;
SELECT id, species_name, population_size FROM biodiversity_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM industrial_activities ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM biodiversity_researchers WHERE specialization = 'Marine Biology';
SELECT * FROM impact_on_ecosystems ORDER BY activity_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, impact_description FROM impact_on_ecosystems WHERE ecosystem_type = 'Forest'
SELECT activity_name, impact_description FROM impact_on_ecosystems WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Grassland' ORDER BY population_size DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_size > 10000
